description.zh-cn: 西晋宗室，司马懿与张春华的第三子。性格乖僻，但在八王之乱中得以远害全身。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Western Jin dynasty, the third son of Sima Yi and Zhang Chunhua. He had an eccentric personality but managed to survive the War of the Eight Princes unscathed.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏末期权臣，西晋的奠基人，追尊为晋宣帝。
description.en: A powerful official in the late Cao Wei period and the founder of the Western Jin dynasty, posthumously honored as Emperor Xuan of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿的正妻，司马师、司马昭、司马干的母亲，追谥为宣穆皇后。
description.en: The primary wife of Sima Yi, mother of Sima Shi, Sima Zhao, and Sima Gan, posthumously honored as Empress Xuanmu.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏末期权臣，司马懿长子。
description.en: A powerful official in the late Cao Wei period, the eldest son of Sima Yi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏末期权臣，司马懿次子。
description.en: A powerful official in the late Cao Wei period, the second son of Sima Yi.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿与张春华之女。
description.en: Daughter of Sima Yi and Zhang Chunhua.

description.zh-cn: 西晋宗室，司马懿第四子，八王之乱中的八王之一。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Western Jin dynasty, the fourth son of Sima Yi, one of the eight princes in the War of the Eight Princes.

description.zh-cn: 西晋宗室，司马懿第九子，八王之乱中的八王之一，曾篡位称帝。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Western Jin dynasty, the ninth son of Sima Yi, one of the eight princes in the War of the Eight Princes who briefly usurped the throne.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏名将及官员。
description.en: A famous general and official of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏及西晋官员，满宠之子，司马干之内兄。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei and Western Jin, son of Man Chong, and brother-in-law of Sima Gan.

description.zh-cn: 司马干的世子，早卒。
description.en: The heir apparent of Sima Gan, who died early.

description.zh-cn: 司马干的次子，封安德县公，在永嘉之乱中遇难。
description.en: The second son of Sima Gan, enfeoffed as the Duke of Ande County, who was killed during the Disaster of Yongjia.

description.zh-cn: 西晋开国皇帝，司马昭之子。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Western Jin dynasty, son of Sima Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 西晋第二位皇帝，司马炎之子。
description.en: The second emperor of the Western Jin dynasty, son of Sima Yan.

description.zh-cn: 西晋第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西晋宗室，八王之乱中的八王之一。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Western Jin dynasty, one of the eight princes in the War of the Eight Princes.

description.zh-cn: 西晋宗室，八王之乱中的八王之一。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Western Jin dynasty, one of the eight princes in the War of the Eight Princes.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上三国时期北方的政权。
description.en: A state in northern China during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上三国时代之后的大一统王朝。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history following the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏第四位皇帝。
description.en: The fourth emperor of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 司马昭的掾属，满伟之子。
description.en: An aide to Sima Zhao, son of Man Wei.

description.zh-cn: 司马昭的掾属。
description.en: An aide to Sima Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏及西晋官员，时任司马昭的从事中郎。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei and Western Jin, serving as Attendant Gentleman to Sima Zhao at the time.

description.zh-cn: 西晋时期发生于统治阶层内部的一系列动乱。
description.en: A series of civil wars among the ruling class of the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西晋末年，汉赵军队攻陷西晋首都洛阳的事件。
description.en: The event in the late Western Jin dynasty where Han Zhao forces captured the capital, Luoyang.

description.zh-cn: 十六国时期汉赵的君主，永嘉之乱中攻陷洛阳。
description.en: A ruler of the Han Zhao state during the Sixteen Kingdoms period, who captured Luoyang during the Disaster of Yongjia.

description.zh-cn: 西晋时期的首都。
description.en: The capital of the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏时期的一种亭侯爵位。
description.en: A title of marquis of a pavilion during the Cao Wei period.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏时期的一种乡侯爵位。
description.en: A title of marquis of a district during the Cao Wei period.

description.zh-cn: 西晋五等爵位制中的伯爵。
description.en: A title of count in the five-rank nobility system of the Western Jin.

description.zh-cn: 西晋时期的王爵。
description.en: A title of prince during the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代高级文官职位。
description.en: A high-ranking civil official position in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，为皇帝的近臣。
description.en: An official title in ancient China, serving as a close attendant to the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代高级文官职位。
description.en: A high-ranking civil official position in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代高级武官职位。
description.en: A high-ranking military official position in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代“三公”之一，为最高荣誉职衔。
description.en: One of the Three Excellencies in ancient China, a supreme honorary title.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝廷中三个最高官职的合称，通常指司徒、司马、司空。
description.en: A collective term for the three highest official positions in the ancient Chinese court, usually referring to the Minister over the Masses, Minister of War, and Minister of Works.

description.zh-cn: 司马干是司马懿的嫡三子。
description.en: Sima Gan was the third legitimate son of Sima Yi.

description.zh-cn: 司马干是张春华所生的第三子。
description.en: Sima Gan was the third son born to Zhang Chunhua.

description.zh-cn: 司马干与司马师是同胞兄弟。
description.en: Sima Gan and Sima Shi were full brothers.

description.zh-cn: 司马干与司马昭是同胞兄弟。
description.en: Sima Gan and Sima Zhao were full brothers.

description.zh-cn: 司马干与司马亮是异母兄弟。
description.en: Sima Gan and Sima Liang were half-brothers.

description.zh-cn: 司马干与司马伦是异母兄弟。
description.en: Sima Gan and Sima Lun were half-brothers.

description.zh-cn: 司马干与南阳公主是同胞兄妹。
description.en: Sima Gan and Princess Nanyang were full siblings.

description.zh-cn: 司马广是司马干的世子。
description.en: Sima Guang was the heir apparent of Sima Gan.

description.zh-cn: 司马永是司马干的次子。
description.en: Sima Yong was the second son of Sima Gan.

description.zh-cn: 司马炎是司马干的侄子。
description.en: Sima Yan was Sima Gan's nephew.

description.zh-cn: 司马衷是司马干的侄孙。
description.en: Sima Zhong was Sima Gan's grandnephew.

description.zh-cn: 司马冏是司马干的侄孙。
description.en: Sima Jiong was Sima Gan's grandnephew.

description.zh-cn: 司马越是司马干的族侄。
description.en: Sima Yue was Sima Gan's clan nephew.

description.zh-cn: 司马干娶了满宠的女儿为妻，是满宠的女婿。
description.en: Sima Gan married the daughter of Man Chong, making him Man Chong's son-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 司马干的妻子是满伟的妹妹，司马干是满伟的妹夫。
description.en: Sima Gan's wife was the sister of Man Wei, making Sima Gan his brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏皇帝曹髦在位时曾亲自率兵攻打权臣司马昭。
description.en: Emperor Cao Mao of Cao Wei personally led troops to attack the powerful minister Sima Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 曹髦攻打司马昭时，司马昭的掾属满长武和孙佑阻止司马干进入阊阖掖门，导致其未能及时与司马昭会合。
description.en: When Cao Mao attacked Sima Zhao, Sima Zhao's aides Man Changwu and Sun You prevented Sima Gan from entering the Changheye Gate, causing him to fail to join Sima Zhao in time.

description.zh-cn: 曹髦攻打司马昭时，司马昭的掾属满长武和孙佑阻止司马干进入阊阖掖门，导致其未能及时与司马昭会合。
description.en: When Cao Mao attacked Sima Zhao, Sima Zhao's aides Man Changwu and Sun You prevented Sima Gan from entering the Changheye Gate, causing him to fail to join Sima Zhao in time.

description.zh-cn: 因满长武未能让其弟司马干及时进入，司马昭下令将其处死。
description.en: Because Man Changwu failed to let his brother Sima Gan enter in time, Sima Zhao ordered his execution.

description.zh-cn: 因其子满长武之事，司马昭将卫尉满伟免为庶人。
description.en: Due to the incident involving his son Man Changwu, Sima Zhao dismissed Man Wei, the Commandant of the Guards, to the status of a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 在荀勖的劝谏下，司马昭免除了对孙佑的灭族之刑，仅将其贬为庶人。
description.en: Following Xun Xu's advice, Sima Zhao spared Sun You's clan from extermination, only demoting him to the status of a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 晋武帝司马炎登基后，封司马干为平原王。后因其有疾病，特诏留他在洛阳，不必就藩。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Wu of Jin (Sima Yan) enfeoffed Sima Gan as the Prince of Pingyuan. Later, due to his illness, he was specially decreed to stay in Luoyang instead of going to his fief.

description.zh-cn: 赵王司马伦辅政时，任命司马干为卫将军。
description.en: When Sima Lun, the Prince of Zhao, was regent, he appointed Sima Gan as the General of the Guards.

description.zh-cn: 晋惠帝司马衷复位后，加封司马干为太保。
description.en: After Emperor Hui of Jin (Sima Zhong) was restored to the throne, he granted Sima Gan the title of Grand Protector.

description.zh-cn: 在八王之乱中，齐王司马冏起兵平定了篡位的赵王司马伦。
description.en: During the War of the Eight Princes, Sima Jiong, the Prince of Qi, raised troops and defeated the usurper Sima Lun, the Prince of Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 司马冏平定司马伦后，司马干前往祝贺并告诫他；司马冏辅政时，司马干再次到访并警告他不要效法司马伦。
description.en: After Sima Jiong defeated Sima Lun, Sima Gan went to congratulate and warn him; when Sima Jiong was regent, Sima Gan visited again to warn him not to follow Sima Lun's example.

description.zh-cn: 东海王司马越在八王之乱后期得势后，曾前往探望司马干，但司马干闭门不见。
description.en: After Sima Yue, the Prince of Donghai, gained power in the later stages of the War of the Eight Princes, he visited Sima Gan, but Sima Gan refused to see him.

description.zh-cn: 司马干的次子司马永在永嘉之乱中遇难。
description.en: Sima Gan's second son, Sima Yong, was killed during the Disaster of Yongjia.

description.zh-cn: 汉赵君主刘聪派遣军队攻陷西晋首都洛阳，是永嘉之乱的核心事件。
description.en: The Han Zhao ruler Liu Cong dispatched forces to capture the Western Jin capital Luoyang, which was the central event of the Disaster of Yongjia.
